Title: آيات وادعية قرآنية مع اسماء الله الحسنى و شرح معانها المنظوم.
Subject: Āyāt wa-adʻiyah qurʼānīyah maʻa Asmāʼ Allāh al-ḥusná wa sharḥ maʻānihā al-manẓūm (Manuscript)
Call number: This Antique islamic manuscript includes the Surahs from the Holy Quran, Islamic life Prayers and the meaning of the names of Gods. Part of the manuscript includes the explanation of the Quranic supplications & invocations.
